room_title: Escape room "Down The Rabbit Hole" by Escape Reality in Las Vegas
review: We have done 2 rooms at Escape Reality. One of the best ones yet! And the most professional. Decorations were amazing and puzzles were awesome!.You felt like you were IN the story! So so so much fun!The ratings are spot on as well. The Alice room was SO HARD. We will def be back for the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Down The Rabbit Hole" by Escape Reality in Las Vegas
review: Did down the rabbit hole room and had such a blast! Awesome place! Definitely coming back to try the other rooms. Michael, our host was super awesome! Thank you for an amazing adventure!

room_title: Escape room "Down The Rabbit Hole" by Escape Reality in Las Vegas
review: I had the best time at Escape Reality doing "Down the Rabbit Hole". My friends and I had never been to an escape room before and WE CRUSHED IT! All thanks to our amazing Games Master, Casey! Big shout out to the Escape Reality team for making it a memorable night.

room_title: Escape room "Down The Rabbit Hole" by Escape Reality in Las Vegas
review: We played 'Down the Rabbit Hole'. One of the best rooms from what I read, and it didnâ€™t disappoint! Hard but so much fun! Our game master was Taylor. So sweet. So helpful. Communication is key!

room_title: Escape room "Down The Rabbit Hole" by Escape Reality in Las Vegas
review: I wanted to introduce my friends to escape rooms. Took them to Jungala and we raced through in just over half hour! Loved it so much that we decided to try a harder room, Down the Rabbit Hole. We just made it! (with some help). Thoroughly enjoyed it! Would definitely recommend this place.
